annotations:

GOOD DAY!



-VSL : HANDYSIZE  GEARD SDBC (PEFER SHALLOW WATER)

-FOR ONE SINGLE WITH LAWFUL/HARMLESS MINERALS IN BULK

-COMM: 3.75% ADD

-OWISE SUB DTS







=============================================
